ygData.subject: RE: Latest nerf
ygData.msgSnippet: heh, sorry if my responses are coming off as flames as well, i m just writing these inbetween working so i am goin quick =) i havent played my necro since the
ygData.messageBody:
heh, sorry if my responses are coming off as flames as well, i'm just
writing these inbetween working so i am goin quick =)

i havent played my necro since the patch, i actually havent played him
since the kiting nerf. my enchanter was much more needed with my guild so i
concentrated on him for a long time. it just sometimes befuddles me that
people say we are too powerful because of our charm and mezzing. if you
boil down to it, all we CAN do effectively at high levels is crowd control.
debuff, mez the rest of the MOBs, and charm if there is a huge pull. i
never nuke anymore, we arent a nuking class.

i'll be the first to admit, up until recently, necros have been a solo
class. but they can be excellent in groups. the DOTs they can stack while i
mem blur the target so it doesnt go after the necro is a great combo, with
both our pets beating on it. i can take out yellows with one necro that way.

i am just happy i dont have a PVP enchanter. as much as i am sure i'd find
a way around the latest nerf, it would be an adjustment to not have charm
in a fight. does anyone know if charm is on the PVP servers at all? (ie,
can we still charm MOBs?) if so, charm a mob and have it attack a player if
that's possible =)

At 03:49 PM 11/18/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Jeremy Cobb <jeremy@...>
>
>I must appologize for my apparent flame. I know the charm spell for necros
>was crap anyway. I guess I'm just jealous that my enchanter is wanted so
>much for in a group then my necro is. But it is alot easier to kite with my
>enchanter then my necro now. Just charm one mob and set it against another.
>When the one thats being teamed up is dead and your pet is almost dead then
>its very easy to kill it and get exp for both. And I was hunting in Unrest
>the other night and my life suck wouldnt work on a werebat but the enchanter
>in our group (same lvl as me)had no problem casting on it.
>
>I appologize to the list.
